original_text: The man who saw these things has spoken about them. What he says is true. He knows that it really happened. He is telling you the truth so that you can believe.
korean_text: 이를 본 자가 증언하였으니 그 증언이 참이라 그가 자기의 말하는 것이 참인 줄 알고 너희로 믿게 하려 함이니라

sentences.original_text: The man who saw these things
He knows that it really happened
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그것이 정말로 일어났다는 것을 압니다

sentences.original_text: He is telling you the truth
